item.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks as protesters defy crackdown
item.description: Medics at two hospitals tell the BBC more than 100 bodies have been brought in over a two day period.

item.title: One person dead and 300 buildings destroyed in Australia bushfires
item.description: A state of emergency has been declared in Victoria as thousands of firefighters battle the blaze.

item.title: Trump tells Cuba to 'make a deal, before it is too late'
item.description: Trump has been turning his attention to Cuba since US forces seized Venezuelan leader Nicol√°s Maduro.

item.title: Bride and groom killed by gas explosion day after Pakistan wedding
item.description: Eight people were killed after a gas cylinder exploded at a house the morning after the wedding celebration.

item.title: Winners and Sinners: What to expect from the Golden Globes
item.description: Marty Supreme, Sinners and One Battle After Another are the films competing at this year's ceremony.
